body.p: The mean of each of the probability distributions shown above is 5. Which has the largest standard deviation?

response.feedback: Correct. This distribution has the largest spread relative to the mean, with higher relative frequencies that are further from the mean than the other distributions.
Incorrect. This distribution has the second largest standard deviation. Look for one with lower relative frequency near the mean and higher relative frequency further from the mean. Please try again.

Incorrect. This distribution has the third largest standard deviation. Look for one with the lowest relative frequency near the mean and higher relative frequencies further from the mean. Please try again.
Incorrect. This distribution has the smallest standard deviation. It has the highest relative frequency near the mean, which makes the standard deviation small.

question.hint: The standard deviation is a measure of spread. Which distribution has lower relative frequencies near the mean and higher relative frequencies further from the mean?
